    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Spreminjanje tokovnih krogov</string>
            <string language="en">Changing circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändernde Stromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuits changeants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuitos em mudança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuiti cambianti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταβαλλόμενα κυκλώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuitos que cambian</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Oglej si risbo vsakega tokovnega kroga. Če misliš, da bo žarnica (žarnici) svetila, v okvirček ... Učni list lahko uporabite pri poskusu.</string>
            <string language="en">Images of different circuits - decide if the light bulb is on or off.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tokokrog</string>
            <string language="en">circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">žarnica</string>
            <string language="en">electric bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">baterija</string>
            <string language="en">battery</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilder der unterschiedlichen Stromkreise - 
entscheiden Sie, wenn die Glühlampe eingeschaltet oder aus ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des images de différents circuits - décidez si 
l'ampoule est éteinte en fonction ou.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagens de circuitos diferentes - decida-se se o 
bulbo claro estiver sobre ou desligada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini dei circuiti differenti - decida se la 
lampadina è disinserita sopra o.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνες των διαφορετικών κυκλωμάτων - αποφασίστε εάν 
ο ελαφρύς βολβός είναι κλειστός επάνω ή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las imágenes de diversos circuitos - decida si la
bombilla está apagada encendido o.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Batterie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ampoule électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">batterie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circuito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lampadina elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">batteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύκλωμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικός βολβός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μπαταρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">circuito</string>

          <keyword>
